long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Diariste offers you the possibility to have your free diary, but mainly your online diary. Access to your diary from anywhere in the world, from any computer, and whenever you want to. Whether in a few hours, a few days or even a few years, find the history of all your writings. 

Respecting the spirit of a diary, Diariste protects your most intimate thoughts. With the help of a secret key (username and password), you have access to your diary, and you can freely manage all your writings so you can choose to make them visible or not for other readers.
